TopicTitle: Contract part test button not appearing

Articles.Content:
I have a couple of contracts which involve testing parts - the TT70 radial decoupler and the structural pylon. When I get ticks by all the prerequisites such as altitude and speed, right clicking on the parts only give the option of decoupling (I tried that, but it count as testing, and just means I wasted the time of two flights!).

Is this a bug or am I doing something stupid?

Edited November 8, 2014 by airelibre

Some parts need to be staged to "test." The decouplers fit into that category. So once all the check marks are green, you must stage the decoupler to complete the test. Buried in the contract, it will usually tell you which method must be used.

Cheers,

~Claw
